name: The 7th World Conference on Research in Social Sciences (Socialsciencesconf)
content: As you are planning out your calendar for this year, make sure to add SOCIALSCIENCECONF 2024 to it. You would not want to miss it. This academic conference on social sciences offers an immersive learning experience with academics from around the world presenting their latest research on subjects of local and international importance. The format of the event is designed to maximize learning opportunities, which is why it features oral presentations, poster presentations, interactive group sessions, discussion and Q&A engagements, workshops, and more. The impact of the conference on social sciences and humanities extends far beyond the venue halls. It facilitates connections that last decades. It enables the attendees to discover new research and partnership opportunities. It enriches the knowledge by ensuring the diversity of views, experiences, and areas of expertise. SOCIALSCIENCECONF 2024 â€“ 17-19 May, Rome, Italy. Mark your calendar!
